summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A  2011 DODGE RAM 2500. THE CONTACT RECEIVED RECALL NOTICE NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER: 13V529000 (STEERING) AND STATED THAT THE PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE DEALER GAVE AN UNREASONABLE TIME FRAME FOR WHEN THE PARTS WOULD BE AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS ALSO NOTIFIED AND COULD NOT PROVIDE A REASONABLE DATE FOR WHEN THE RECALL WOULD BE REPAIRED. THERE ARE NO FAILURES AT THIS TIME.    THE DEALER REPLACED THE STEERING COMPONENT, ON THE VEHICLE.  UPDATED 07/15/14
